update LIS_INSPEC_USERS

USERNAME_CN = #{usernameCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INSPEC_NAME = #{inspecName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

AUTO_GRAPH = #{autoGraph,jdbcType=CLOB},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
